description: Quick unlock KeePass 2 database using biometrics with Windows Hello.

installer.script: if (installed 'keepass' $global) {Copy-Item "$dir\KeePassWinHelloPlugin.plgx" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins"} else { error 'Please install `keepass` first, then reinstall `keepass-plugin-keepasswinhello`.'}
